plays.text: Penalty to Eric Lindros 2 minutes for Hooking Jamie Langenbrunner

Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for High Sticking Brian Gionta
Penalty to Ronald Petrovicky 2 minutes for Boarding Colin White
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Scott Gomez
Goal scored by Jeff Friesen assisted by Joe Nieuwendyk and Brian Rafalski
